text: So i know the HubDB Row limit is 10,000 is there a column limit to the tables?
ajlaporte: Curious about this as well. I assume it's probably something far more limited / reasonable (since each row has to return and allow iteration over those rows)
nope, thereâ€™s no limit on columns.
Of course if you had hundreds or something, your pages would probably load slowly.
For those who are looking to try and quickly visualize DB's and map them. I highly recommend this: <http://quickdatabasediagrams.com>
